name.title: Name
name.description: The WavePlus device name to show in HomeKit.

serialNumber.title: Serial Number
serialNumber.description: The WavePlus serial number from the device's sticker.

disableTemp.title: disableTemp
disableTemp.description: If false, will display the WavePlus temperature reading in HomeKit.

disableHumidity.title: disableHumidity
disableHumidity.description: If false, will display the WavePlus humidity reading in HomeKit.

frequency.title: frequency
frequency.description: If set, provides the frequency (in seconds) for updating HomeKit.
